requirements_text.requirements:
**Requirements Analysis**

### Functional Requirements

* The system must generate a Certificate of Completion.
* The certificate must include the following details:
	+ Name of the student (e.g., D U R A I R A J S)
	+ College/University name (e.g., S r i K r i s h n a C o l l e g e E n g i n e e r i n g a n d T e c h n o l o g y)
	+ Department name (e.g., CSBS)
	+ Year of study (e.g., Second Year)
	+ Internship Programme details (e.g., Machine Learning in TANSAM)
	+ Duration of the internship (e.g., 18th March – 18th April, 2024)
* The system must assign a unique Certificate Number (e.g., COE/042024/DT/003)

### Non-Functional Requirements

* The system must ensure the accuracy and validity of the certificate details.
* The system must provide a professional and formal tone in the certificate.

### Constraints

* The system must adhere to the specified format and structure of the certificate.
* The system must ensure that the certificate is generated within a reasonable timeframe (e.g., by the end of the internship period).

### Assumptions

* The system has access to the necessary student information and internship details.
* The system has the necessary templates and formatting guidelines for generating the certificate.
